dentist.title: Dentist
dentist.tagline: AI reads the X-ray. Humans fix the tooth.

tasks.description: AI detects cavities, bone loss, and pathology in dental radiographs with high accuracy.
AI suggests treatment plans from diagnostic data and generates patient documentation.
AI manages scheduling, reminders, insurance verification, and billing.
AI handles insurance claims, pre-authorizations, and dispute resolution.
Fillings, crowns, extractions, root canals — physical dental procedures require human hands.
Explaining diagnoses, calming anxious patients, and building trust is human.
Diagnosing TMJ, oral cancer, and complex conditions requires clinical expertise.
Implants, extractions, and oral surgery are physical skills AI cannot perform.

companies.name: Overjet
companies.threat: AI dental analysis detecting cavities and bone loss in X-rays — assists, doesn't replace

companies.name: Pearl
companies.threat: AI dental pathology detection providing real-time diagnostic support

companies.name: Dentistry.AI
companies.threat: AI platform for dental diagnostics and treatment planning

companies.name: VideaHealth
companies.threat: AI dental X-ray analysis integrated into practice management systems

companies.name: Henry Schein
companies.threat: AI-powered practice management reducing administrative workload for dentists

timeline.description: AI assists with diagnostics and admin. Dentists remain fully essential for all clinical work.
AI handles most diagnostic imaging. Dentists focus on procedures and patient relationships.
Dentistry remains hands-on. AI augments diagnostics but cannot replace clinical care.

skills.description: Dental implants — high-value, physically demanding specialty.
Veneers, whitening, smile design — elective procedures driven by patient desire.
Integrate AI diagnostic tools to catch more pathology and improve treatment planning.
Own and manage a dental practice — the entrepreneurial path.
Specialized care for anxious patients and those with disabilities.

physician.title: Physician (MD/DO)
physician.tagline: AI aids the diagnosis. Humans heal the patient.

tasks.description: AI generates clinical notes from patient-physician conversations in real-time.
AI suggests diagnoses from symptoms and test results, serving as a clinical decision support tool.
AI checks interactions, suggests alternatives, and ensures evidence-based prescribing.
AI automates insurance prior authorization reducing physician administrative burden.
AI handles scheduling, referrals, and inbox management for physicians.
Hands-on physical exam, palpation, and clinical observation require human touch.
Integrating history, exam, labs, and imaging into a diagnosis requires expert judgment.
Performing surgery requires human dexterity, judgment, and real-time decision-making.
Breaking bad news, discussing treatment options, and providing emotional support is human.
Balancing risks, patient preferences, and clinical evidence requires experienced judgment.

companies.name: Microsoft/Nuance
companies.threat: AI ambient scribe eliminating clinical documentation burden — helps physicians, doesn't replace

companies.name: Google DeepMind
companies.threat: AI medical knowledge and protein prediction advancing diagnostics and drug discovery

companies.name: Glass Health
companies.threat: AI diagnostic reasoning tool that generates differential diagnoses from clinical info

companies.name: Abridge
companies.threat: AI clinical documentation from patient conversations — reducing physician burnout

companies.name: Hippocratic AI
companies.threat: AI agents for non-diagnostic healthcare tasks — patient communication and navigation

timeline.description: AI reduces admin burden 40%. Physicians remain essential. AI assists diagnosis but doesn't replace clinical judgment.
AI handles most documentation and routine screening. Physicians focus on complex care and patient relationships.
Physicians remain central to healthcare. AI is a powerful diagnostic tool, but healing requires human doctors.

skills.description: Deep specialization in cardiology, oncology, neurology — complex medicine requiring years of training.
Physical procedures that require human dexterity and real-time judgment.
Integrate AI tools to see more patients, catch more diagnoses, and reduce burnout.
Virtual care delivery expanding access while maintaining quality.
Medical director, CMO, or healthcare leadership roles.

healthcare-administrator.title: Healthcare Administrator
healthcare-administrator.tagline: AI optimizes the operations. Humans navigate the politics.

tasks.description: AI automates billing, coding verification, claims submission, and denial management.
AI optimizes nurse and staff schedules based on patient volume predictions.
AI predicts admissions, manages bed availability, and reduces wait times.
AI tracks quality metrics, generates reports, and identifies improvement opportunities.
AI manages medical supply inventory, predicts demand, and optimizes procurement.
Service line development, market strategy, and growth planning require leadership.
CMS regulations, accreditation, and policy interpretation need expert human judgment.
Managing physician dynamics, staff morale, and organizational culture is human.

companies.name: LeanTaaS
companies.threat: AI-powered hospital capacity optimization reducing admin decision-making

companies.name: Qventus
companies.threat: AI hospital operations platform that automates patient flow decisions

companies.name: Waystar
companies.threat: AI revenue cycle management automating billing and claims processing

companies.name: GE HealthCare
companies.threat: AI hospital command center optimizing operations in real-time

companies.name: Olive AI
companies.threat: AI automation platform for healthcare administrative workflows

timeline.description: AI automates 60% of operational tasks. Administrators focus on strategy and leadership.
AI manages most routine operations. Administrators focus on strategic growth and regulatory navigation.
Healthcare operations significantly AI-managed. Human administrators focus on strategy, politics, and culture.

skills.description: Service line development, M&A, and market strategy.
Lead AI implementation and digital health initiatives.
Navigate the shift from fee-for-service to value-based models.
CMS, Joint Commission, and state regulation expertise.
Lead organizational transformation in rapidly evolving healthcare.

teacher-k12.title: Teacher (K-12)
teacher-k12.tagline: AI delivers the content. Humans inspire the student.

tasks.description: AI generates lesson plans aligned to standards with activities and assessments.
AI grades objective assignments and provides feedback on writing, freeing teacher time.
AI generates materials at different reading levels and learning styles from a single lesson.
AI handles parent communication, report cards, attendance tracking, and IEP documentation.
AI provides personalized tutoring and practice problems adapted to each student's level.
Managing student behavior, creating safe spaces, and maintaining classroom culture is human.
Supporting students' emotional development, recognizing struggles, and providing guidance is human.
Inspiring curiosity, building confidence, and mentoring young people is irreplaceably human.
Building relationships with families and community requires human connection.

companies.name: Khan Academy
companies.threat: AI tutor providing personalized instruction — supplements teachers, doesn't replace

companies.name: MagicSchool
companies.threat: AI teacher assistant handling lesson plans, grading, and differentiation

companies.name: Duolingo
companies.threat: AI language tutor replacing some aspects of language instruction

companies.name: Sal Khan / GPT
companies.threat: 1-on-1 AI tutoring available to every student — democratizing personalized learning

companies.name: Diffit
companies.threat: AI content differentiation tool creating leveled materials for any topic

timeline.description: AI handles 50% of admin and content creation. Teachers focus on what they do best — teaching and inspiring.
AI tutors supplement instruction. Teachers become learning facilitators and mentors.
Teachers remain essential. AI transforms the role but human educators are central to child development.

skills.description: Master AI teaching tools to personalize learning and reduce admin burden.
SEL expertise — the human core of teaching that AI can't replace.
Working with diverse learners requires specialized human expertise.
Teaching coding, robotics, and AI literacy — growing demand.
Coach other teachers and lead professional development.

college-professor.title: College Professor
college-professor.tagline: AI delivers the lecture. Humans advance the knowledge.

tasks.description: AI generates lecture slides, handouts, and reading materials from course objectives.
AI grades essays and exams with rubric-based feedback, though nuanced evaluation needs humans.
AI chatbots answer common student questions and provide study support 24/7.
AI manages LMS, tracks attendance, sends reminders, and compiles course data.
AI assists with literature review and data analysis but novel research requires human creativity.
Guiding students' academic and career paths requires human understanding and connection.
Generating novel hypotheses, designing experiments, and advancing knowledge is deeply human.
Facilitating intellectual discourse and Socratic dialogue requires human expertise.

companies.name: Coursera
companies.threat: AI-powered online courses from top universities — competing with in-person lectures

companies.name: Khan Academy
companies.threat: AI tutor providing personalized instruction at scale

companies.name: edX/2U
companies.threat: AI-enhanced online learning competing with traditional higher education

companies.name: Elicit
companies.threat: AI research assistant that automates literature review and analysis

companies.name: Turnitin
companies.threat: AI writing detection and automated grading changing assessment dynamics

timeline.description: AI handles admin and content delivery. Professors focus on research, mentorship, and deep teaching.
AI tutors handle foundational instruction. Professors focus on research and advanced seminars.
Traditional lecture format evolves. Professors remain essential for research, mentorship, and intellectual leadership.

skills.description: Publish novel research — the core academic differentiator AI can't replace.
Design courses that leverage AI tools for personalized learning.
Bridge academia and industry for relevant, funded research.
Master digital pedagogy for broader reach and impact.
Secure research funding — a critical academic survival skill.

tutor.title: Tutor
tutor.tagline: AI tutors 24/7. But some students need a human.

tasks.description: AI solves and explains homework problems step-by-step across all subjects.
AI generates unlimited practice problems at any difficulty level with explanations.
AI explains concepts in multiple ways, adapting to student's learning style.
AI generates practice tests, identifies weak areas, and provides targeted review.
AI tracks student progress, identifies gaps, and adapts learning paths.
Keeping students motivated, building confidence, and maintaining accountability is human.
Supporting students with ADHD, dyslexia, and other challenges requires human patience.
Communicating progress and concerns to parents requires human relationships.

companies.name: Khan Academy
companies.threat: Free AI tutor available to every student — the biggest disruption to tutoring

companies.name: OpenAI
companies.threat: General AI that can tutor on any subject at any level

companies.name: Photomath
companies.threat: AI math tutor that solves problems from photos with step-by-step explanations

companies.name: Duolingo
companies.threat: AI language tutor with conversation practice and personalized feedback

companies.name: Chegg
companies.threat: AI homework help and study tools replacing human tutoring services

timeline.description: AI handles 70% of routine tutoring. Human tutors focus on motivation, test-taking strategy, and learning disabilities.
AI tutors become highly effective. Human tutors become learning coaches and mentors.
Basic tutoring fully automated. Human tutors focus on special needs, motivation, and premium test prep.

skills.description: Support students with learning disabilities — ADHD, dyslexia, autism.
High-stakes test prep with mindset coaching — SAT, MCAT, bar exam.
Use AI tools to personalize instruction while providing human connection.
Teach organization, time management, and study skills.
Guide students through applications, essays, and admissions strategy.

instructional-designer.title: Instructional Designer
instructional-designer.tagline: AI builds the course. Humans design the learning experience.

tasks.description: AI generates lesson content, quizzes, and activities from learning objectives.
AI generates multiple-choice, short-answer, and scenario-based assessments.
AI drafts course storyboards and video scripts from outlines.
AI-powered tools generate interactive e-learning modules from content inputs.
AI generates training videos with AI presenters from scripts.
Designing effective learning experiences based on cognitive science requires human expertise.
Understanding audience needs, skill gaps, and organizational context needs human investigation.
Managing SME relationships and aligning training with business goals is human.

companies.name: Synthesia
companies.threat: AI-generated training videos replacing human presenters and production teams

companies.name: Articulate
companies.threat: AI-assisted e-learning authoring making course creation accessible to non-designers

companies.name: Anthropic
companies.threat: AI that generates comprehensive course content, assessments, and learning materials

companies.name: Docebo
companies.threat: AI-powered LMS that personalizes learning paths and content delivery

companies.name: 360Learning
companies.threat: AI collaborative learning platform with auto-generated content

timeline.description: AI generates 60% of course content. IDs focus on learning strategy and complex simulations.
AI creates full courses from objectives. IDs become learning experience architects.
Standard training content automated. IDs focus on immersive learning, simulations, and adaptive systems.

skills.description: Apply cognitive science to create effective, engaging learning — the strategic layer.
Design VR simulations and AR learning experiences — the next frontier.
Design and manage AI-powered adaptive learning platforms.
Move beyond course creation to solving business performance problems.
Measure learning impact and optimize based on outcome data.

school-administrator.title: School Administrator
school-administrator.tagline: AI manages the data. Humans lead the school.

tasks.description: AI manages student records, enrollment, attendance tracking, and reporting.
AI optimizes class schedules, room assignments, and resource allocation.
AI generates state and federal compliance reports from school data.
AI assists with budget tracking and forecasting but allocation decisions need human judgment.
AI drafts and distributes newsletters, alerts, and parent communications.
Setting school vision, building culture, and inspiring staff and students is human leadership.
Hiring, evaluating, coaching, and developing teachers requires human judgment.
Building relationships with parents, community, and school board is human.
Handling student crises, safety incidents, and community concerns requires human leadership.

companies.name: PowerSchool
companies.threat: AI-powered school management platform automating admin tasks

companies.name: Infinite Campus
companies.threat: AI student information system handling enrollment, grading, and reporting

companies.name: Frontline Education
companies.threat: AI-powered HR and operations management for K-12 schools

companies.name: ClassLink
companies.threat: AI-powered digital learning platform managing student access and analytics

companies.name: SchoolAI
companies.threat: AI platform providing personalized learning assistants for every student

timeline.description: AI handles 55% of admin tasks. Administrators focus on leadership, culture, and community.
AI manages most operational tasks. Administrators focus on instructional leadership and innovation.
School administration evolves but remains fundamentally human — leadership, culture, and community can't be automated.

skills.description: Lead curriculum, teaching quality, and student achievement improvement.
Lead the integration of AI tools in schools responsibly.
Use data and analytics to drive school improvement.
Ensure equitable access and outcomes for all students.
Build strong school-community partnerships and family engagement.

esl-teacher.title: ESL Teacher
esl-teacher.tagline: AI teaches the grammar. Humans teach the confidence.

tasks.description: AI provides personalized grammar lessons, vocabulary drills, and spaced repetition.
AI provides real-time pronunciation feedback and accent coaching.
AI generates leveled reading passages and comprehension activities.
AI assesses language proficiency and recommends placement levels.
AI chatbots provide conversation practice but lack cultural nuance and patience.
Helping immigrants navigate cultural adaptation requires human empathy and understanding.
Building student confidence to speak in a new language requires human encouragement.
Designing plans for diverse learners with different backgrounds and needs is human.

companies.name: Duolingo
companies.threat: AI language tutor with conversation practice — the biggest threat to basic ESL instruction

companies.name: Elsa
companies.threat: AI pronunciation coach that provides real-time feedback on spoken English

companies.name: Speak
companies.threat: AI conversation partner for language learning — unlimited speaking practice

companies.name: OpenAI
companies.threat: AI conversation partner that can practice any language at any level

companies.name: Babbel
companies.threat: AI language learning platform with speech recognition and adaptive lessons

timeline.description: AI handles basic language instruction. ESL teachers focus on conversation, culture, and confidence.
AI conversational practice improves dramatically. ESL teachers focus on cultural integration and advanced skills.
Real-time translation may reduce demand for ESL. Teachers focus on cultural education and specialized academic English.

skills.description: Support immigrant integration and cross-cultural communication — deeply human.
Teach academic and professional English for university and career success.
Leverage AI tools while providing the human connection students need.
Refugees, low-literacy adults, and children with trauma need specialized human support.
Design culturally responsive curricula for diverse learners.

project-manager.title: Project Manager
project-manager.tagline: AI tracks the tasks. Humans lead the team.

tasks.description: AI generates project status reports, burndown charts, and executive dashboards automatically.
AI assigns tasks based on capacity, tracks progress, and flags at-risk items.
AI schedules meetings, generates agendas, transcribes, and creates action items.
AI identifies schedule and resource risks from project data patterns.
AI optimizes resource allocation across projects but priority decisions need human judgment.
Managing expectations, navigating politics, and communicating bad news is human.
Inspiring teams, resolving conflicts, and building culture requires human leadership.
Negotiating scope changes and managing competing priorities requires judgment.
Navigating ambiguity and making decisions with incomplete information is human.

companies.name: Asana
companies.threat: AI project management that auto-assigns, tracks, and reports on projects

companies.name: Monday.com
companies.threat: AI-powered work management that generates reports and identifies bottlenecks

companies.name: Atlassian
companies.threat: AI-powered project tracking with automated sprint planning and risk detection

companies.name: Forecast
companies.threat: AI project management that auto-schedules and predicts project outcomes

companies.name: ClickUp
companies.threat: AI-powered productivity platform automating task management and documentation

timeline.description: AI handles 60% of project admin. PMs focus on leadership, stakeholder management, and problem-solving.
AI manages project operations. PMs become program leaders and organizational change agents.
Project admin fully automated. PMs focus on strategic program management and organizational leadership.

skills.description: Manage multiple interrelated projects — strategic coordination AI can't do.
Lead organizational agile transformations — change management expertise.
Deep technical understanding combined with project leadership.
Navigate organizational politics and influence decisions.
Orchestrate AI tools for project management efficiency.
